title: Products API - Get product catalog
description: Test the products API endpoint to retrieve the product catalog for tarot readings, numerology, and premium packages.

title: Cards API - Get cards by locale
description: Test the cards API endpoint to retrieve tarot cards filtered by locale (tr, en, sr) with optional filters for arcana type and suit.

title: Cards API - Get single card by slug
description: Test the cards API endpoint to retrieve a single tarot card by slug and locale, including validation of locale and slug parameters.

title: Reading Sessions - Save reading with token
description: Test the reading sessions save-reading endpoint to save a tarot reading using a token (for unauthenticated users), including validation of token, reading data, and session status.

title: Reading Sessions - Complete session
description: Test the reading sessions complete endpoint to mark a session as completed, including token validation and reading_id association.

title: Admin - Create reading session
description: Test the admin reading sessions endpoint to create a new reading session for a customer, including email validation, spread key, and reading type validation.

title: Admin - Rate limit check
description: Test the admin login rate limit endpoint to verify rate limiting functionality for admin login attempts, including IP-based rate limiting.

title: Payment Webhook - Shopier payment processing
description: Test the Shopier payment webhook endpoint to process payment confirmations, including signature validation, duplicate payment detection, credit balance updates, and transaction logging.

title: Engagement - Card reactions
description: Test the card reactions API endpoint to add, update, and remove reactions on tarot cards, including fingerprint-based user tracking and reaction counting.

title: Auth Check - Session validation
description: Test the auth-check endpoint to validate user sessions and retrieve user role information, including both POST and GET methods.
